detectors.description:
PimpCoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#55-60) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#57)
detectors.markdown:
[PimpCoin.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#L55-L60) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#L57)

detectors.description:
PimpCoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#61-67) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#62)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#64)
detectors.markdown:

	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#L64)

detectors.description:
PimpCoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#41-43) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _totalSupply - balances[address(0)] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#42)
detectors.markdown:
[PimpCoin.totalSupply()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#L41-L43) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:

detectors.description: Variable PimpCoin._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#28) is not in mixedCase

PimpCoin.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#33-40) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 10000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#37)
detectors.markdown:
[PimpCoin.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#L33-L40) uses literals with too many digits:

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#3)
	- PimpCoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#41-43)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#4)
	- PimpCoin.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#44-46)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- PimpCoin.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#47-49)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#5)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#6)
	- PimpCoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#55-60)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- PimpCoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#50-54)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#7)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#19)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol#19-21)
function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PimpCoin.sol)#50
